instructions: Earthquake: Stay indoors and take cover under sturdy furniture. Stay away from windows and heavy objects.
Flood: Move to higher ground immediately. Avoid walking or driving through floodwaters.
Fire: Evacuate the building. Use stairs, not elevators. Call emergency services.
Cyclone: Secure loose objects and windows. Move to a safe room away from glass.
Tsunami: Move inland or to higher ground immediately upon receiving a warning.
Pandemic: Follow health advisories. Wash hands frequently and wear a mask.
